system.description: Your Cyber-Mantle and Potentia Coil have been extensively upgraded, turning you into a formidable combat platform bristling with augmetic enhancements.
system.benefit:
The character's Cyber-Mantle and Potentia Coil are further upgraded. Gain +10 Strength and Toughness, but -5 Agility and Fellowship. Now weight three times as much, can no longer swim, and suffer -10 to tests to move silently.

However, any Ballistic Mechadendrites the character equips can now mount any pistol (without requiring compact upgrade) or one-handed melee weapon.

prerequisites.text: Mechanicus Secutor Alternative Advance, 500xp, Tech-Priest, Mechadendrite Use (Ballistic)

specialAbilities.name: Enhanced Mechadendrite Mounting
specialAbilities.description: Your Ballistic Mechadendrites can now mount any pistol (without compact upgrade) or one-handed melee weapon.

specialAbilities.name: Cannot Swim
specialAbilities.description: Due to your increased weight and bulk, you cannot swim and automatically sink in water.
